content: Great app and have had good customer service with them when I ran into issues with another of their products. My kid loves both Berenstain Bears apps. This one works great, is educational, and very enjoyable for replay

I used to play these all the time as a kid. I got this to use as an adult. There was a few stuff missing when i first got it. But with a new update, everything is back in place. I highly reccomend this if you have young children. They will love interacting with everything, and listening to the story as they watch. Im defiently intoroducing these to my nephew.

Wonderful reproduction of the old Living Books PC game.  They seem to have gotten every detail.  The interactive book will be sure to occupy with all kinds of witty things that happen when you touch the pictures.  Well done!

When I was younger, I only owned 2 of the Living Books (Arthur's Birthday & Just Grandma & Me).  I always wanted the other ones but, had to stick to playing the demos.  Being able to play this on my Nexus 7 is amazing.  I can't wait until more apps come out!
